executive_summary: The Correctional Facilities has suffered from a mixture of policy changes at the federal and local levels, coupled with broader support for rehabilitative solutions to the broader issue of crime. Demand is uniquely separate from the broader economic climate, in which revenue growth is primarily influenced by crime and incarceration rates. Public opinion and its effect on government policy regarding the privatization of prisons directly affects demand and participation. Revenue fell at a CAGR of 3.2% to an estimated $8.0 billion, including an estimated 6.0% decline in 2024 as profit reached an estimated 9.7%.

current_performance.current_performance_point_title: Historical Trends Continue to Drag Industry Performance Downward
current_performance.current_performance_point_description: Historical declines in crime and incarceration rates have contributed to waning demand for correctional facilities.
Revenue increases have been generally fueled by increased investment and demand, particularly in 2019.

current_performance.current_performance_point_title: Aside from crime and incarceration, public opinion and policy regarding for-profit prison systems directly influence revenue.
current_performance.current_performance_point_description: Reports of inadequate medical care, excessive use of solitary confinement and unsanitary conditions have led to facility closures.

future_outlook.future_outlook_point_title: Shifting Public Sentiment Against Private Prisons is Amplified
future_outlook.future_outlook_point_description: Increased scrutiny from the public regarding for-profit incarceration facilities will continue to shift government policy away from outsourcing to the private sector.

future_outlook.future_outlook_point_title: A larger push toward community-oriented programs will accelerate this trend moving forward.

industry_definition: The Correctional Facilities industry consists of operators that own or manage correctional facilities and halfway houses. Services provided by industry enterprises include private janitorial, maintenance, trash disposal, guard and security, mail routing reception, laundry and other services that support operations in correctional facilities.
